name: myanimelist-redesign
description: A redesigned user interface for Myanimelist with multiple themes and layout improvements

scripts.cp-malr: cp -r menu javascript images background.js manifest.json build/
scripts.build-malr: npm run cp-malr && npm run min-css && cd build/images && rm -rf temp github*.png
scripts.build-bb: cp -r bbeditor build/ && cd build/bbeditor && minify jquery.wysibb.js > wysibb.min.js && cleancss --batch --batch-suffix "" theme/default/*.css && rm -rf lang preset jquery.*.js *.md *-MIT
scripts.build-tree: mkdirp build/css/minified build/javascript build/bbeditor build/images build/menu
scripts.build: npm run build-tree && npm run build-malr && npm run build-bb

author: Hritik Vaishnav
